ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(!cache.get("ua")){   	cache.put("ua",java.ajax("https://randua.somespecial.one/"),86400);
    	}
//!(/google.cn/).test(baseUrl)?h=java.getString("id.acontent@html"):h=decodeURIComponent(baseUrl.replace(/^.*?text=/, ''));
url = baseUrl.replace("www.bilinovel.com","tw.linovelib.com")
//re = java.ajax(url)
//h = java.webView(re,url,null);
//java.setContent(re); 
h = java.webView(src,baseUrl,null);
original_list = java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children")

java.setContent(h)
h = java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children");
//java.log(h[4])
//java.log(h.length)
if(h.length!=original_list.length){//there is repeat item
	

//replace to correct text
function confident(str1, str2){
	if(str1.length!=str2.length){
		return false; 
		}
		if(str1.length==0){
			return true;
			}
		confidence =0;
		target = Math.max(1,Math.floor(str1.length/2));
	for(let i=0;i<str1.length;i++){
		if(str1[i]==str2[i]){
			confidence++;
			if(confidence>=target){
				return true;
				}
			}
		}
		return false;
	}
k=0
for(let i=0;i<original_list.length;i++){
if(k>=h.length){
break;
}
ele = original_list[i]
str = String(java.getString("text",ele));
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log(str)
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(str.length)
//java.log(strcom.length)
while(k<h.length&&!confident(str,strcom)){
k++
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log("x")
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(strcom.length)
}

if(k<h.length){
if(java.getString("tag.script@all",ele)!= ""){
original_list[i] = h[0]
}else{
original_list[i] = h[k]
}
}

k++
}
h = original_list
}//close repeat item
else
{
	h = java.getString("tag.body@tag.div.5@html")
	}
//run readtools.js match words
//run js file's last line
//jsLink = java.getString("tag.script@src").match(new RegExp("https.+readtools.+", "gi"))[0];
//h=String(h);
//code = String(java.ajax(jsLink)).trim().split("\n").pop().trim().split(";")[1];

h
</js>

ruleContent.content:
let domain = String(Get('url')).split(".")[1]; function addOptions(url, baseUrl, options) { let j = { "Referer": baseUrl.replace(/,[\s\S]+\}/, "") }; if (!url.includes(domain)) { j.Referer = ""; } options = options || {}; options.headers = Object.assign(options.headers || {}, j); return options ? `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}` : url; } function arrayToImg(arr, func, baseUrl, options) { let result = []; for (let item of arr) { let imgUrl = addOptions(item, baseUrl, options); let imgTag = ``; if (typeof func === "function") { imgTag = func(imgUrl); } result.push(imgTag); } return result.join("\n"); } function stringToImg(str, func, baseUrl, options) { let imgUrl = addOptions(str, baseUrl, options); let imgTag = ``; if (typeof func === "function") { imgTag = func(imgUrl); } return imgTag; } function load(urls) { for (let url of urls) { let response = java.ajax(url); if (!/exception/.test(response)) { return [response, url]; } } throw "Error: æ‰€æœ‰é“¾æ¥ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥"; } function parseKeys() { let jsBaseUrls = ["https://raw.githubusercontents.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator@main/"]; let urls = ["plugins/common.js", "plugins/cocomanhua.js", "tools/babel_asttool.js", "tools/config.js", "tools/decode.js", "tools/decodeOb.js", "tools/usefulPlugins.js"]; let jsBaseUrl = cache.get(`cache_${Get('url')}`); if (!jsBaseUrl) { jsBaseUrl = load(jsBaseUrls)[1]; java.toast(jsBaseUrl); cache.put(`cache_${Get('url')}`, jsBaseUrl); } function toAbsUrl(url) { return /^\.\/|^http|^content|^\/sdcard|^\/storage/.test(url) ? url : jsBaseUrl.concat(url); } function loadJS(urls) { let scripts = ""; for (let url of urls) { let absoluteUrl = toAbsUrl(url); let content = java.ajax(absoluteUrl); let scriptTag = script(content); scripts += scriptTag; } return scripts; } function script(content) { return ``; } let html = `${loadJS(urls)}`; return java.webView(html, Get('url'), "keys"); } if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { let DEBUG = 0; let local_keys = null; function base64Decode(base64) { return java.base64Decode(base64) + ""; } let aes = { keys: null, retryNum: 1, saveKeys: function (keysString) { try { this.keys = JSON.parse(keysString); let localKeys = cache.get('keysString'); if (localKeys !== keysString) { cache.put('keysString', keysString); return true; } } catch (e) { java.log(keysString); java.log("âå¯†é’¥è§£æé”™è¯¯ï¼ï¼"); } }, _aesDecrypt: function (key, word) { return java.createSymmetricCrypto("aes/ecb/pkcs7padding", key).decryptStr(word) + ""; }, decrypt: function (word, name) { if (this.keys && this.keys[name]) { for (let key of this.keys[name]) { try { return this._aesDecrypt(key, word); } catch {} } } if (this.retryNum-- > 0) { if (this.saveKeys(parseKeys())) { return this.decrypt(word, name); } } throw "âè§£å¯†å¤±è´¥ï¼Œæ— æ³•è·å–å¯†é’¥ï¼ï¼"; } }; function decodeImage(src) { let C_DATA = src.match(/C_DATA\s*=\s*\S([\s\S]+?)['"]/); if (!C_DATA) { throw "âå›¾ç‰‡æ•°æ®C_DATAè·å–å¤±è´¥ï¼ï¼"; } C_DATA = aes.decrypt(base64Decode(C_DATA[1]), "C_DATA"); DEBUG && java.log(C_DATA); eval(C_DATA); let html = ""; if (!image_info.img_type) { let path = mh_info.enc_code2 ? aes.decrypt(base64Decode(mh_info.enc_code2), "enc_code2") : mh_info.imgpath; let totalImageCount = mh_info.enc_code1 ? aes.decrypt(base64Decode(mh_info.enc_code1), "enc_code1") : mh_info.totalimg; let servers = [mh_info.domain]; if (typeof __JS_READLINE !== "undefined") { if (__JS_READLINE.data && __JS_READLINE.data.length > 0) { servers.push(__JS_READLINE.data[0].domain); } else if (__JS_READLINE.domain) { servers.push(__JS_READLINE.domain); } } let server = mh_info.use_server === "" ? servers[0] : servers[0].replace(/^img/, `img${mh_info.use_server}`); let options = {}; let suffix = "jpg"; if (image_info.imgKey !== undefined && image_info.imgKey !== '' || image_info.keyType !== undefined && image_info.keyType !== '') { if (image_info.keyType === '0') { colakey = aes.decrypt(image_info.imgKey, "C_DATA"); } else { let colajsUrls = ["https://qyyuapi.com/cola.js"]; let colajs = cache.get(`cache_colajs_${Get('url')}`); let currentHash = colajs ? java.md5Encode(colajs) : null; for (let i = 0; i < colajsUrls.length; i++) { try { let response = java.ajax(colajsUrls[i]); let newHash = java.md5Encode(response); if (newHash !== currentHash) { colajs = response; cache.put(`cache_colajs_${Get('url')}`, colajs); break; } } catch (e) { java.log(`âåŠ è½½${colajsUrls[i]}å¯†é’¥æ–‡ä»¶é”™è¯¯`); } } {{cache.get(`cache_colajs_${Get('url')}`)}} colakey = ImgKey(image_info.keyType); if (colakey == '') { java.log(`âè¿œç¨‹å¯†é’¥æ–‡ä»¶æœªæ›´æ–°ï¼Œè¯·30åˆ†é’Ÿåå†è¯•`); } } options = { "key": enc_webp_bytes_key = colakey, "headers": { "Cookie": `_tka_${mh_info.pageid}=${path};_tkb_${mh_info.pageid}=${totalImageCount}`, "Origin": Get('url') } }; suffix = "enc.webp"; } if (DEBUG) totalImageCount = 1; for (; mh_info.startimg <= totalImageCount; mh_info.startimg++) { let imgPath = `https://${server}/comic/${encodeURIComponent(path)}${String(mh_info.startimg).padStart(4, "0")}.${suffix}`; html += stringToImg(imgPath, null, baseUrl, options) + "\n"; } } else { let urls__direct = base64Decode(image_info.urls__direct).split("|SEPARATER|"); if (DEBUG) urls__direct.splice(0, 1); if (image_info.img_type === 1) { html = arrayToImg(urls__direct, url => url + ".webp", baseUrl); } else { html = arrayToImg(urls__direct, null, baseUrl); } } return html; } (function () { if (local_keys !== null && local_keys !== '') { aes.keys = local_keys; } else if (cache.get('keysString') !== null && cache.get('keysString') !== '') { aes.saveKeys(cache.get('keysString')); } else { aes.retryNum = 1; DEBUG && aes.saveKeys(parseKeys()); } return decodeImage(src); })(); } else { '
'; }
